text.more:
Click on a node to display the courses that it leads to. This app shows how all courses at Stanford are related to each other! Each node represents a course, and the edges leading away from it show which other courses it is a prerequisite for. Template provided by InteractiveVis project
http://blogs.oii.ox.ac.uk/vis/
https://github.com/oxfordinternetinstitute/InteractiveVis/

text.title: Stanford Cardinal Direction
